[#IntentionallyConstructedObjectState]
= IntentionallyConstructedObjectState

[plantuml]
....
include::../puml/Core_IntentionallyConstructedObjectState.plantuml[] 
....

|===
|Element |Description

|Type
|Class

|Name
|IntentionallyConstructedObjectState

|IRI
|http://www.ontology.asam.net/Core#IntentionallyConstructedObjectState

|Subclass of
|State

|Comments
|DEF: A State that exists because of an act of will or agreement. That means that IntentionallyConstructedObjects are constructed intentionally by one or more things that have intent, usually humans or robots.

EXAMPLES:

USAGE: Generally use FunctionalObjectState or one of its subclasses rather than this class.

link:http://www.informationjunction.co.uk/hqdm_framework/hqdm_framework/lexical/state_of_intentionally_constructed_object.htm[Reference to HQDM state_of_intentionally_constructed_object] 

|===
